languages.text: "...И должно заблудшим слушать пастырей своих, и следовать за ними, и быть кроткими и благодарными..."

traits.locale_text: "...И должно заблудшим слушать пастырей своих во всем. И следовать за ними во всем. И быть кроткими и благодарными..."

languages.text: "'...And those who have strayed must listen to those who would guide them, and follow them, and be meek and grateful...'"
languages.original_text: "...И должно заблудшим слушать пастырей своих, и следовать за ними, и быть кроткими и благодарными..."

traits.locale_text: "...And such as have strayed must listen to their shepherds, and follow them, and be meek and grateful..."
"...And such as have strayed must listen to their shepherds, and follow them, and be meek and grateful..."
"...And those who have strayed must listen to those who would guide them, and follow them, and be meek and grateful..."
"...And those who have strayed must listen to those who would guide them, and follow them, and be meek and grateful..."
"'...And those who have strayed must listen to those who would guide them, and follow them, and be meek and grateful...'"
"'...And those who have strayed must listen to those who would guide them, and follow them, and be meek and grateful...'"

languages.text: « ... Et que ceux qui se sont égarés écoutent les paroles de leurs guides, et qu'ils les suivent avec humilité et reconnaissance... »
languages.original_text: "'...And those who have strayed must listen to those who would guide them, and follow them, and be meek and grateful...'"

traits.locale_text: « ... Et que ceux qui se sont égarés écoutent les paroles de leurs guides, et qu'ils les suivent avec humilité et reconnaissance... »

languages.text: «"... Y quienes se alejen del camino escucharán a los guías, los seguirán, serán mansos y agradecidos..."».
languages.original_text: "'...And those who have strayed must listen to those who would guide them, and follow them, and be meek and grateful...'"

traits.locale_text: «"... Y quienes se alejen del camino escucharán a los guías, los seguirán, serán mansos y agradecidos..."».

languages.text: 「『…そして迷えし者達は、導きし者達の言葉に耳を傾け、従い、謙虚な心で感謝するのだ…』」
languages.original_text: "'...And those who have strayed must listen to those who would guide them, and follow them, and be meek and grateful...'"

traits.locale_text: 「『…そして迷えし者達は、導きし者達の言葉に耳を傾け、従い、謙虚な心で感謝するのだ…』」

languages.text: “‘……迷途之人必须遵从引导者的指引，追随他们的教诲，时刻保持谦恭、感激……’”
languages.original_text: "'...And those who have strayed must listen to those who would guide them, and follow them, and be meek and grateful...'"

traits.locale_text: “‘……迷途之人必须遵从引导者的指引，追随他们的教诲，时刻保持谦恭、感激……’”

languages.text: "' ... Und wer vom Weg abgekommen ist, der muss auf jene hören, die ihn leiten, und ihnen folgen, und gefügsam und dankbar sein ...'"
languages.original_text: "'...And those who have strayed must listen to those who would guide them, and follow them, and be meek and grateful...'"

traits.locale_text: "' ... Und wer vom Weg abgekommen ist, der muss auf jene hören, die ihn leiten, und ihnen folgen, und gefügsam und dankbar sein ...'"

languages.text: "Yolundan sapanlar ise kendilerine kılavuzluk edecekleri dinleyip takip etmelidir. İtaatkâr ve minnettar olmalıdır..."
languages.original_text: "'...And those who have strayed must listen to those who would guide them, and follow them, and be meek and grateful...'"
